tu.note: IMPORTANT: Native transcription of the language (e.g. Dansk, Deutsch, English). IMPORTANT: "English" should not be just translated! IMPORTANT: If the rest of the xml:lang attribute is left with the value "en", it's crucial to update the one of this entry with the correct value (e.g. fr, it, zh_CN, etc.).

tuv.seg: Cannot get the geo location for {0} {1}. This is probably an invalid postal code.
Cannot get your geo-coordinates from the browser. You have to set the postal and country codes manually.
Cannot get the postal code and country code for the location resolved by your browser. You have to manually specify these codes.

tu.note: DO NOT TRANSLATE! Regular expression used to determine a valid Canadian postal code
Message displayed when a Canadian postal code is invalid

tuv.seg: Canadian postal code format: A0A 0A0, where A is a letter and 0 is a digit.

tu.note: DO NOT TRANSLATE! Regular expression used to determine a valid US zipcode
Message displayed when a Canadian postal code is invalid
Description for search engines, as it can appear to customers when they look for a service/product

tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy.com users (consumers and retailers) can privately use the AnotherSocialEconomy.com Console to manage their orders. You can access your data with exisiting credentials (your identity provided will do the verification for us, AnotherSocialEconomy.com does not keep passwords) and consolidate accounts to communicate with AnotherSocialEconomy.com over many channels (Twitter, E-mail, GTalk, etc.).

tu.note: Message displayed to Microsoft IE 6 browser users, calling them to install a modern browser!

tuv.seg: You are using an outdated browser!

tu.note: Message displayed to Microsoft IE 6 browser users, calling them to install a modern browser!

tuv.seg: To use this site, please upgrade to a modern web browser.

tu.note: Keywords for search engines

tuv.seg: consumers, retailers, goods, services, local, postal code, range, expiration date

In order to use the AnotherSocialEconomy.com console, you need to be authenticated first. To eliminate the management of yet another set of credentials, AnotherSocialEconomy.com relies on OpenID, so you can log in with one of your existing electronic identities. Consult OpendId.net website for more information on that technology.

tu.note: Text place in front of the input field that is going to receive the user's input for his custom OpenID identifier.

tuv.seg: Enter the missing part of the OpenID:

tu.note: Text place after the input field that is going to receive the user's input for his custom OpenID identifier.
This message is displayed on the login page and have no context about the visitor location
This message is displayed on the login page and have no context about the visitor location

tuv.seg: AnotherSocialEconomy.com maintains the list of the top active cities (refreshed once a day). Use the following links to see the most used keywords by retailers per city:

AnotherSocialEconomy.com is a creation of Steven Milstein and Dom Derrien. AnotherSocialEconomy.com is operated by Milstein & Associates inc.

For more information, you can join the AnotherSocialEconomy.com community at twetailer.cyn.in.

tu.note: {0}: user name

tuv.seg: Hint: as reported by your OpenID provider.
Hint: to attach messages exchanged within the domain @anothersocialeconomy.appspotmail.com.
Hint: to attach instant messages exchanged with anothersocialeconomy@appspot.com with your account.

Hint: to attach direct messages exchanged with twitter.com/ASEconomy with your account.
Note: you need to follow @ASEconomy on Twitter in order to be able to get direct messages from us.
Confirmation code for the AnotherSocialEconomy.com registration process

Here is the confirmation code: {0}. You have to reported it into the Welcome page for new AnotherSocialEconomy.com users.| | Thanks for shopping with AnotherSocialEconomy.| | If you did not initiate this notification, it's possible someone miss-associates his account and yours. If you think someone tries to spoof your account, forward this message to abusive-notification@anothersocialeconomy.appspot.com.

tu.note: Information message for the screen screen at step 4, displayed when all given (and valid) identifiers match one existing account. {0}: mechanism used to send the verification code -- See entries: - consumer_info_verification_alert_email - consumer_info_message_jabber_for_verification_code - consumer_info_message_twitter_for_verification_code {1}: identifier for the third-party communication channel

tuv.seg: A verification code has been sent {0} to: {1}. Please, report it in the input field below to be able to complete the registration process.

tu.note: Information message for the screen screen at step 4, mechanism for sending confirmation codes. See entry: consumer_info_verification_alert
Information message for the screen screen at step 4, mechanism for sending confirmation codes. See entry: consumer_info_verification_alert
Information message for the screen screen at step 4, mechanism for sending confirmation codes. See entry: consumer_info_verification_alert
Generic error message presented to the Console user when there's an error while communicating with the server

tuv.seg:
Unexpected error while processing a request response. The incident is going to be reported to AnotherSocialEconomy.com analytics system.

 You can send an e-mail to incident@anothersocialeconomy.appspotmail.com if the issue is crucial to you.

 Follow our communication on Twitter (@ASEconomy) for our open tracking of the critical issues.

tu.note: Displayed in response to a HTTP status code 401 // Unauthorized

tuv.seg: Your authentication token expired. Please, log in again.

tu.note: Displayed in response to a HTTP status code 403 // Forbidden

tuv.seg: Access to this page is reserved. You're about to be redirected to the corresponding page for Consumers.
AnotherSocialEconomy.com experiences issues while trying to communicate over Twitter. Please try when Twitter server is back online.
AnotherSocialEconomy.com cannot send direct messages to users who are not following it. You must follow @ASEcononmy (http://twitter.com/ASEconomy) in order to use it from Twitter.

The system needs your e-mail address to forward tee-time proposals. ezToff values your privacy and will never share your e-mail address without your consent.

If you specify the e-mail address of your partners, they'll be CC'ed each time your receive a notification.
